1.dialogue: Many human beings and many desires…

2.dialogue: There, demand and supply are born♥

3.dialogue: Looking for a person who needs the power of Devil,\Satisfying that desire,\In return we will receive <color="ff9900">part of the soul</color>.
3.speaker: none

4.dialogue: That's the birth of a Child in this world,\It's a ceremony of <color="ff9900">Agreement</color>… !
4.speaker: none

5.dialogue: Cute Master…\You will be walking the path of the <color="ff9900">Demon Road</color> from now on.\Mona will <color="ff9900">support you</color> with all power ♥
